about_the_game:
Dance Studio VR is a virtual reality dancing game. The Player can choose different characters to play as, and can choose their own songs to play. The goal of the game is to mimic the dance moves of the other two characters in the studio. The faster and more accurate the players moves, the faster they win. If you’re having trouble with the moves, you can practice them in the Practice Room.
Through out the game Summer will be your guide. She will offer you assistance and walk through to help you understand the game. She will also help you stay motivated by giving shouts of encouragement.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SPI or better
  • Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350, equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (AMD Radeon R9 290) or better
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Room Scale 2m by 1.5m area required
